game.name: Tree of Knowledge
game.shortDescription: TREE OF KNOWLEDGE is a roguelite where you beat trivia questions instead of monsters. By using a combination of powerful artifacts, flexible skills and your own general knowledge; try your hand at climbing to the top!
game.shortDescriptionEn: TREE OF KNOWLEDGE is a roguelite where you beat trivia questions instead of monsters. By using a combination of powerful artifacts, flexible skills and your own general knowledge; try your hand at climbing to the top!
